entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly that ends in 'dotnet' fails ANCM in Azure #38004
  • Consider adding an API that enables invoking the default parameter binding logic of RequestDelegateFactory explicitly #38003
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Remove Libuv transport #38002
    7.0-preview1
  • Startup regression: mvc, plaintext #37997
  • Perf regression: caching #37996
  • Make ResponseCacheMiddleware endpoint aware #37995
    .NET 7 Planning
  • blazor-wasm publish missing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.dll #37994
  • Versioning Api endpoints with webapi .net 6 and swagger error #37993
  • Content Security Policy blocks script execution in default template. #37992
  • Consider writing an analyzer that produces warnings when using sync APIs on IDistributedCache #37991
    Backlog
  • ServerCanAbortConnectionAfterUnobservedClose-Loopback test failure #37990
  • add an analyzer to catch parameter name mismatches between route and [FromRoute] params #37987
  • TypeNameHandling not working with abstract classes: "Type specified in JSON 'T' was not resolved." #37986
  • EntityFrameworkCoreXmlRepository Seems Suboptimal? #37985
  • Missing of cookieless session management #37978
  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter: Deserialize error handling #37977
  • Startup regression: json #37976
  • Perf regression: updates #37975
  • BrowserRefreshServer.WaitForClientConnectionAsync #37974

Closed

  • Does GRPC run on Web App (App Services) as of November 2021? #37988
  • Send Alt-Svc frame in HTTP/2 rather than header. #18928
    Backlog
  • dotnet.js whereabouts #37999
    Discussions
  • Hot reload loses CSS from referenced projects #37592
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor wasm Datetime controller Parameter throwing error, The value '01.11.2021 16:17:40 01:00' is not valid. #37989
  • SignalR client timeout on StartAsync behaves differently across platforms and does not appear to be configurable #37824
  • Blazor HeadOutlet is not pre-rendering #37960
  • How to declare a method target attribute on `BuildRenderTree`? #37970
  • Blazor Server limit @bind content size #37973
  • Blazor File Downloads Documentation #30736
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Attempt to disable Blazor WASM AOT #37984
  • Perf improvement: caching, connectionclosehttps, mvc #36713
  • Blazor WASM - AD B2C - Unable to get access_token MSAL 2.0 #37928
  • How to set AppInsightKey based on Environment Variable in Blazor wasm Hosted App #37953
  • blazor was server prerendering error #37965

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK #38001
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a575301` to `ffdec25` #37983
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37981
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37980
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37979
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37969
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37968
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37967
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37966
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Hide test infrastructure from the solution explorer #38000
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Run Sockets.BindTests in sequence #37998
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update StartupAnalyzers to use Analyzer.Testing library #37934
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • feat (Codespaces) - Added Commonly used tasks to `tasks.json` for VSCode users. #37873
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor
  • Adding descriptions in HttpSysOptions #37949
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Make in-memory HTTP/2 tests more deterministic #37948
    area-runtime
  • Create ReleasePlanning.md #37940
    Docs, area-infrastructure
